original_text: Now you must be careful to obey me and my covenant with you. Then you will belong to me as my special people. The whole earth belongs to me, and I have chosen you from among all the nations.
korean_text: 세계가 다 내게 속하였나니 너희가 내 말을 잘 듣고 내 언약을 지키면 너희는 모든 민족 중에서 내 소유가 되겠고

sentences.original_text: Now you must be careful to obey me
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 너희는 나를 순종하기를 주의해야 한다

sentences.original_text: Then you will belong to me
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 너희는 나의 소유가 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: The whole earth belongs to me
